clientLogLevel.title: Client Log Level
clientLogLevel.description: Specify that level of logging from lldb debugger client

serverLogLevel.title: Server Log Level
serverLogLevel.description: Specify that level of logging from lldb debugger server

pythonBinaryPath.title: Python Path
pythonBinaryPath.description: Path to the python binary used to run the LLDB backend.

lldbPythonPath.title: LLDB Python Module Path
lldbPythonPath.description: Custom path to Python 'lldb' module. The directory should be called lldb and contain __init__.py and _lldb.so.

buckConfigRootFile.title: Buck Build Root
buckConfigRootFile.description: Path of the buck config root directory. The source file paths in debug symbol will be relative to this directory.

debugPort.title: Debug Port
debugPort.description: The port used by debugger UI connecting with backend

useTerminal.title: Launch in terminal
useTerminal.description: If checked, when launching a native binary, Nuclide will redirect the target's STDIN and STDOUT streams to a new Nuclide terminal pane.
